Work

Stage TEN

During my time at Stage TEN I contributed to the development of a control room web app that can preview, switch and mix live video sources from any connected camera with pre-produced segments. My responsibilities included the user experience design of the product and front-end web development of the web app. The app was a hybrid of Ruby on Rails and AngularJS.

I was responsible for working on several projects simultaneously that ranged in scope from high profile websites, to design of the bi-weekly university newspaper, to design and execution of email campaigns.

Freelance

Since graduation in 2006, I have maintained long term relationships with several freelance clients including Action Canada, Hang Gliding and Paragliding Association of Canada and New Ventures BC. I provide my clients with innovative and time sensitive services to help promote their programs including: design of annual reports, invitations, on-site programs, email marketing, and website design and development.
